title: Unknown geometric bauhaus-type font!
content:
I received the following from a client of mine looking for that font. For some reason, a lot of the characters are missing on the slate.   
   
Anyone might have an idea?   
   
Thanks!   
 ![Unknow Font - Bauhaus Approach](http://web.archive.org/web/20060519211809im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/20297.jpg)
author: arseno

comments.content: It's sort of a customized [ITC Bauhaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20060519211809/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/bauhaus/medium/testdrive.html?s=abcdef%20pqrtuv&p=72) meets [Letraset Pump](http://web.archive.org/web/20060519211809/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/pump-2/pump-light/testdrive.html?s=abcdef%20pqrtuv&p=72) meets House Industries' [Chalet](http://web.archive.org/web/20060519211809/http:/houseind.com/house.php?kit=CHALET-FO&sub=view) kind of thing.

This isn't the exact one you want, but the free font Hammer Thin has similar letter shapes. You have to download all the "h" fonts to see it [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20060519211809/http:/johnf.hypermart.net/fonts.htm).
